name: Avoid MXML component with more than two entry points (Flex)
description: This QR reports Adobe mxml scripts that have more than two entry points represented by public variables and\or setter.
output:
This QR reports MXML scripts that have more than two public variables. It provides following information:
- MXML Script Fullname
rationale: In order to have better encapsulation there should be only one entry point to mxml.
remediation: Have only one entry point into MXML component.
remediationSample:
<mx:Script>
      <![CDATA[
      
      private var firstPublicVariable:int = 1;
      private var _secondPublicVariable:int = 2;
      public var thirdPublicVariable:int = 3;
        
      public function get secondPublicVariable() : int {
         return _secondPublicVariable;
      }
      
      //...       
        

        ]]>
   </mx:Script>
sample:
<mx:Script>
      <![CDATA[
      
      public var firstPublicVariable:int = 1;
      private var _secondPublicVariable:int = 2;
      public var thirdPublicVariable:int = 3;
        
      public function get secondPublicVariable() : int {
         return _secondPublicVariable;
      }
      
      public function set secondPublicVariable(anint: int) : int {
         _secondPublicVariable = anint;
      }

      //...       
        

        ]]>
   </mx:Script>
